reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/appearance'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/modules'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/#overlay=admin/modules'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'MPS' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'MPS' to be visible in module list.
Uncheck the 'MPS' module checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Enter 'Dynamic Queue Workbench' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Dynamic Queue Workbench' to be visible in module list.
Uncheck the 'Dynamic Queue Workbench' module checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Enter 'Dynamic Queue' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Dynamic Queue' to be visible in module list.
Uncheck the 'Dynamic Queue' module checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Uninstall' overlay tab.
Scroll by '-500'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'MPS' uninstall checkbox.
Click the 'Uninstall' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Confirm uninstall dialog'.
Verify the text 'The following modules will be completely uninstalled from your site, and all data from these modules will be lost!' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'MPS' is present on the page.
Click the 'Uninstall' button to confirm.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Uninstall' overlay tab.
Scroll by '-500'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue Workbench' uninstall checkbox.
Click the 'Uninstall' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Confirm uninstall dialog'.
Verify the text 'The following modules will be completely uninstalled from your site, and all data from these modules will be lost!' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Dynamic Queue Workbench' is present on the page.
Click the 'Uninstall' button to confirm.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Uninstall' overlay tab.
Scroll by '-500'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue' uninstall checkbox.
Click the 'Uninstall' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Confirm uninstall dialog'.
Verify the text 'The following modules will be completely uninstalled from your site, and all data from these modules will be lost!' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Dynamic Queue' is present on the page.
Click the 'Uninstall' button to confirm.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Uninstall' overlay tab.
Scroll by '-500'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/config/regional/settings'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/config/regional/date-time'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/structure/types/manage/media-gallery/fields/field_media_items/widget-type'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/structure/types/manage/media-gallery/fields/field_media_items'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Home' menu link.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/people/permissions'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/config/media/file-system'.
Click the 'Home' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc dialog'.
Select revision titled 'futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc'.
Verify that the 'Operation' option count equals '5'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '10/20/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '03:04 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost10/20/20144a43350d5b454fc dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/#overlay=admin/content/logos'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Manage Logo dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/#overlay=logo/add'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add Logo dialog'.
Enter '506df3adde09499' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Verify the file image 'nbclogosmall' is present.
Verify the the img is loaded and visible.
Enter '2014-10-20' in the 'Start Date' text box.
Enter '03:04:46 PM' in the 'Start Time' text box.
Enter '2014-10-20' in the 'End Date' text box.
Enter '04:59:46 PM' in the 'End Time' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Manage Logo dialog'.
Verify the text '506df3adde09499' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Mon, 10/20/2014 - 15:04' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Mon, 10/20/2014 - 16:59' is present on the page.
Assert the file image 'nbclogosmall' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
MPX is already configured.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media' link.
Select 'AutomationPlayer1' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/structure/types/manage/cfa0d142ae/delete'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/structure/types/manage/e522bce9df/delete'.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/admin/structure/types/manage/mpx82c1271d8f/delete'.
Mouse over the 'Home' menu link.
Click the '[[Driver: chrome on MAC (a7a4d11d-e650-4581-be14-91299cbf044f)] -> xpath: //span[@class='admin-menu-home-icon']/../..//a[text()='Flush all caches']]' menu link.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Enter '6d8154322cbc476' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Create Character Profile'.
Assert that img source of the Cover Photo contains 'HanSolo'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Character Profile 6d8154322cbc476 has been created.' is present.
